full_summary:
### Minor Use Pesticide Program (MUPP) - Field and Greenhouse Research Trials

**Reference Number:** cb-932-38944933
**Publication Date:** December 20, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number:** 8
**Solicitation Number:** 01B68-23-0049

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Description:**

Agri-Food Canada is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to conduct field and greenhouse research trials as part of the Minor Use Pesticide Program (MUPP). The objective of this RFP is to award multiple contracts to conduct field trials across North America, generating efficacy and crop tolerance data and crop samples for laboratory analysis of pesticide residues.

**Eligibility:**

Bidders must possess the necessary expertise, experience, and certification to conduct pesticide efficacy and crop tolerance trials, residue trials, and screening trials in accordance with OECD Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) standards or those of U.S.A. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) GLP and GLP study plans.

**Award Information:**

Awards will be made based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. Multiple contracts will be awarded, and bidders may be selected for only a portion of the trials proposed.

**Attachments:**

Available through the Canada Buys website: [insert URLs]

**Contact Information:**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
1305 Baseline Road, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0C5
Phone: 555-555-5555
Email: [kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca](mailto:kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca)
